content.description:
Head up to the ledge at the left end of the big wall, pro is pretty tricky and the stances aren't great. once on the ledge, head LEFT to the clean corner heading up, the last few meters of the route are dirty and contain some loose rocks! Au coin gauche du mur principal grimpez jusqu'a la vire, la protection est pas superbe et les repos non plus. un fois sur la vire, traversez a gauche pour suivre le diedre jusqu'en haut, les derniers metres sont sales avec quelques roches lousses. Standard rack, tree belay.

Rack standard, assurez sur un arbre.

Climb easily to the large ledge at the base of the arete. Make difficult and technical moves onto the face/arete. Just after the second bolt, figure you way out onto the left side of the arete (crux) and follow the bolt line of La Farête. Generally easier climbing with some good positioning, holds, and moves leads to the fixed anchor shared with La Farête. Start: The bolt line that obviously leads to the imposing hanging arete.
Descent: Fixed anchor 10 bolts to rappel ring.

Same start as the arete though instead of moving to the left, you remain on the right side of it. 
  
 Même départ que L'arête, mais plutôt que de traverser à gauche, on reste sur le côté droit de l'arête.

11 bolts to rappel ring

Head up the slab and small cracks under the inviting crack and roof, pull the roof using the left corner system and run back to that pretty handcrack corner to the top. Grimpez la dalle fissuré en dessous du petit toit, surmontez le toit en utilisant le petit diedre a gauche, retournez dans la craque du fond et montez le diedre jusqu'au relais. first crack on the right when at the right end of the main cliff.

Premiere craque a droite lorsqu'on est a la droite du mur principal. Single rack, doubles #1-#3
rack simple, doubles #1-#3

One of the destination route for this area. Climbs very well. Climb easy rock past two bolts to the base of the roof. Make a clip and get yourself to the next bolt. Figure out a tricky move to easier climbing up some ledges and through a shallow right-facing corner to an obvious ledge below a unique pocketed headwall. Weave your way through the hard to read face for a few meters and a couple bolts then climb easier terrain to the fixed anchor. Start: Just to the left of the striking arete of ___ at a sloping ledge 2 feet off the ground.
Descent: Fixed anchor 12 draws should be enough

Link up of L'Arête and La Face. Same start as La Face. 2-3 bolts passed the tiny roof, keep right and follow the upper section of l'Arête until you reach the anchor. 

Link up of the first part of La Face and the upper section of l'Arête.
10 bolts to rappel ring

Climb easy non-descript rock to the overhang formed at the base of the appealing small right-facing corner immediately right of the line of bolts to the right of the chimney. Climb the crack system in this corner to a fixed anchor immediately right of the tree. Start: At the non-descript, easy, broken terrain to the right of the chimney on the right end of the hanging buttress. Standard rack

Two-bolt anchor

Head up to the ramp and follow the thin crack/corner on the right of the chimney to the belay. Grimpez jusqu'a la rampe et suivez la petite fissure/coin a droite de la cheminee jusqu'au relais. Small-medium sized rack.

Rack petit-moyen.

Once on top of the tree at the right of the chimney, you can linkup most of the lower routes with a short bolted line that runs over the gap and to the top of the main face. Une fois arrive aux relais des voies a droite de la cheminee il est possible de continuer ces voies en enjambant le gouffre pour aller joindre le sommet du mur principal. rap using a single 70m to the ground.

rappel avec une corde de 70m. 3 bolts an one hand-sized piece (around #.75).

3 ancrages et un morceau environ #.75.

Head up to the ramp and make your way left to the chimney. Climb up inside the corner, behind a large block and chimney/stem to the anchor. Grimpez la vire et lancez vous a gauche dans la cheminee, passez derriere le gros bloc jusqu'a l'ancrage plus haut. Big Bro? slings for the block? suggest Top roping it first...

Tres gros morceaux? sangles pour le bloc? suggere la faire en moulinette en premier.

Head up to the first ramp and follow the bolts up. Committing. Grimpez jusqu'a la petite vire et suivez les plaquettes. Bolted route on the right of the chimney.

Ligne de plaquettes a droite de la cheminee. 5 bolts + the anchor 5 plaquettes + le relais

Head up to the ledge at the left end of the big wall, pro is pretty tricky and the stances aren't great. once on the ledge, head straight up the facer. Au coin gauche du mur principal grimpez jusqu'a la vire, la protection est pas superbe et les repos non plus. Un fois sur la vire, suivez la face jusqu'en haut. 70m rope or have a second rope to rap.
Standard rack.

Corde de 70m ou deuxième corde pour redescendre.
Rack Standard.
The obvious flat area you come to with the large imposing/appealing arete that starts 30 feet up.
